name: ChildGrowth
0:
”Alexa open child growth”
”my son is ten months old”
”she is sixty months”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: child growth
des:
HOW TO USE:
To Get Started: Say "Alexa open Child Growth". Then, to check child growth say "My son is ten months old" or "She is five months". 

INFO : 
- Period : 0 month ~ 60 months
- Data Source : The WHO Child Growth Standards (https://www.who.int/childgrowth/standards)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
